Ultra Detailed: blurry, low quality, pixelated, grainy, lowres, compressed, smudge
Photorealistic Plus: cartoon, 3d render, anime, plastic skin, doll-like, fake, illustration
Perfect Anatomy: deformed body, extra limbs, missing limbs, fused limbs, malformed, disfigured
Detailed Hands & Fingers: extra fingers, missing fingers, mutated hands, bad anatomy, deformed hands, fused fingers
Balanced Face: asymmetrical face, deformed eyes, lazy eye, double face, melted face, distorted features
Hard-Surface Cybernetics: organic, biological, soft, messy wires, blurry metal, non-reflective, skin, sketch
Subsurface Scattering: flat skin, plastic, gray skin, dead skin look, opaque, solid surface
Wet & Glistening: dry, matte, dusty, flat texture, non-reflective
Skin Imperfections: smooth skin, airbrushed, plastic, anime, 2d, doll-like
High Dynamic Range (HDR): flat lighting, overexposed, underexposed, washed out colors, dull
Raytraced Shadows: flat shading, no shadows, bad lighting, 2d look, glowing shadows
Sharp Focus: motion blur, out of focus, depth of field blur, bokeh, smudge, kinetic blur
